posts.post_content:
Shipping will be $1 or $3 (within the U.S.).  Your choice.  
-$1 shipping does not include tracking and is at your own risk.  However, I have mailed out over 100 packages this way, and only lost one (plenty of satisfied customers who would                   vouch for this).  
-$3 shipping includes tracking, and I am liable if a package is lost.
